name: switchball
summary: Switchball (originally CrazyBall) is a 3D action-puzzle game, made by Swedish developer Atomic Elbow, which was released for Microsoft Windows on June 26, 2007, on Xbox Live Arcade for the Xbox 360 on November 7, 2007 and on PlayStation Network for the PlayStation 3 on September 17, 2009.
info:
• 中文名: 置换魔球
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 发行日期: 2007年
  • 开发商: Atomic Elbow
